page.title: 01The Borderlands
page.content: The area is flat and is mainly mixed agriculture, some dairy farms, beef and sheep, with the land varying from heavy clay through to light sandy soil. The main railway line from Shrewsbury to Chester runs through the eastern section and the A5 London to Holyhead road runs though the centre. In the south east section there is a lenth of the Shropshire Union Canal which originally ran through to Welshpool. Construction of the Whittington and Owsestry by pass commenced in 1985 and this road will pass through sections 5,9, 10 and 11.
